title: Thrive - Goals Ideas Decisions Download
text: You know how we all come up with those kinds of goals and ideas that get us really excited but then for some reason we never really do anything about them?That's about to change with Thrive, a new kind of productivity app that will tackle some of the main problems:tackle your most ambitious goalsMake your goals seem less monumental and vague by thinking of the steps required to achieve them and working on one at a time.save and organise ideasSave all your big ideas and quick thoughts throughout the day.visualise difficult decisionsMake big decisions more manageable by visualising the impact of each option on the parts of your life you care most about.You can also use it to take notes, get automatic stats on your progress and more.
